Class Candle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Candle
  • public class Candle
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Peter Antonaros LabSection: 11F Class that defines a Candle object its attributes and behaviors Each Candles has a height, width, price attribute along with an attribute to check if it is lit or not

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Candle​(int h, int w, float p)
      Candle Class constructor taking in 2 Integer and 1 float parameters

    • Constructor Detail

      • Candle

        public Candle​(int h,
              int w,
              float p)
        Candle Class constructor taking in 2 Integer and 1 float parameters
        Parameters:
        h - Integer variable that represents the height of the candle.
        w - Integer variable that represents the width of the candle.
        p - Float variable that represents the price of the candle.
